backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor file serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features for clickable area names in property listings, including navigation, styling, and smooth transitions with high confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of 13 frontend files describing the complete STATEGURD real estate website structure including routing, components, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining navy blue and gold palette, smooth scroll behavior, and design tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO meta tags for STATEGURD real estate services and script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home page and dynamic area-filtered property listings, wrapped in a layout with footer and smooth scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Two-column responsive section with team image and detailed content about STATEGURD's expertise, transparency, and client-centered approach using navy and gold styling.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section with info cards (phone, email, location) and validated inquiry form handling name, phone, email, and property interest with submission state management.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedProperti: Grid of property cards with images, details, and clickable area names that link to filtered listings using TanStack Router with hover effects and featured badges.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying STATEGURD branding, quick links, services, contact information, and social media icons with a copyright notice.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section component with full-screen background image, headline, CTA button that scrolls to contact section, and animated scroll indicator.
frontend/src/components/PropertyListingP: Property listing page component that filters and displays properties by area from URL params, showing property cards with details like price, bedrooms, bathrooms, and square footage.
Services section component displaying four real estate service cards (buying, selling, rental management, investment consultancy) with icons and descriptions in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSect: Testimonials section component showing four client testimonials in card format with quotes, author names, and locations.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUsSecti: Why Choose Us section component highlighting four key features (market expertise, transparency, client-centered approach, secure transactions) with icons and descriptions on a dark navy background.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication state, with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and context provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom navy blue and gold color palette, dark mode support, typography settings, and page transition animations for the STATEGURD brand.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme with custom navy/gold colors using OKLCH color space, typography plugin, container queries, and custom animations for accordions.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining STATEGURD real estate website with navy/gold design system, listing implemented features including hero, services, properties, testimonials, and contact sections with responsive design.
